General.Name: Shanxi Antai Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanxi Antai Group Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells coal washing, coke, cement, pig iron, and electrical products in China. The company provides tar, crude benzene, and ammonium sulfate products; and engages in the section steel business. It also exports its metallurgical and pig iron products to the United States, Europe, Japan, Korea, etc. Shanxi Antai Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jiexiu, China.
